column1: Upleta is a city and tehsil in the Rajkot district of the state of Gujarat
It contains within it two towns and 49 villages.
Upleta is located at 21.73°N 70.28°E﻿ / 21.73; 70.28. It is about 19 kilometres (12 mi) from Dhoraji
column2: in the Rajkot district of Gujarat
column3: on the banks of the Moj river.
775. 51% of the population was male and 49% female. Upleta has an average literacy rate of 71%
column4: higher than the national average of 59.5%. The male literacy rate is 76% and the female literacy rate is 65%. In Upleta
column5: 11% of the population is under 6 years of age.

column1: Rajkot and Porbandar are the nearest airports. Jamnagar is also near by airport around 100 km.
Residents of Upleta have easy access to a nearby highway
column2: National Highway 8B. It connects the cities of Upleta with Rajkot
column5: Gondal and Jetpur. The State Transport Corporation and private bus operators provide bus services between the cities.

column1: The Upleta(UA) Railway station has daily connectivity between Porbandar
column2: Rajkot and Somnath. Also one weekly train to Santragachi Jn(SRC).
